text: (They said this to test him, so that they might have 8:6 something to accuse him of ¦ an accusation against him ANT BYZ HF PCKsomething to accuse him of.) But Jesus stooped down and wrote with his finger on the 8:6 ground, taking no notice. ¦ ground. ANT BYZ HF NA ST WHground, taking no notice.
